EClass.Presentation.LayerObject

Class LayerObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • EClass.Presentation.LayerObject.LayerObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, FreeLine, Image, Oval, Rectangle, Square, StraightLine, TextBox, Triangle

    public abstract class LayerObject
extends java.lang.Object
    LayerObject is a graphical object to be drawn on a Layer. LayerObjects are represented as instructructions to draw an object. LayerObjects are a collection of all the data necissary to draw themselves on the layer including position, size, and color. LayerObjects are responsible for drawing image representations of themselves in the draw() method. LayerObjects may be manipulated (move, resize, setColor, and rotate).

      (package private) double rotationInRadians
      The rotation in radians of this object where a positive change in radians rotates the object counter clock-wise.

    • Field Detail

      • center

        Point center
        The center of the layer object with respect to the origin of the layer. Note: as should be described in layer, the origin or (0,0) of graphical regions in the white board, layer, and layerobjects are at the center of those regions. That means that a positive x center for a layer object places this layer object right of center of the layer, and a negative y center for this layer object places this layer object below the center of the layer. This coordinate system is consistent across other aspects of EClass such as relocating objects.

      • color

        Color color
        The color of this layer object.

      • rotationInRadians

        double rotationInRadians
        The rotation in radians of this object where a positive change in radians rotates the object counter clock-wise.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        abstract void draw()
        Draw the LayerObject. Note: After we decide which graphics library to use, this method will be passed the necissary graphics objects to draw itself on the graphics object. Note: It would be smart to cache an image of this LayerObject and provide some sort of isChanged() method on this object.

      • move

        abstract void move(Point center)
        Move this object to be centered at the specified point.
        Parameters:
        center - the new center of this object.

      • resize

        abstract void resize(double ratio)
        Resize the LayerObject. How resizing occurs depends on which kind of layer object this is.
        Parameters:
        ratio - the ratio of the current size to resize this layer object to. Ex: layerObject.resize(2.0) // make this object twice as large layerObject.resize(0.25) // shrink this object to 1/4 of its current size

      • rotate

        abstract void rotate(double rotationInRadians)
        Change the rotation of this LayerObject.
        Parameters:
        rotationInRadians - the new rotation of this LayerObject

      • setColor

        abstract void setColor(Color color)
        Set the color of this LayerObject.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to set this object to
